name: Elite Moto
carouselDetail2: All your motorcycle needs in one place
carouselDetail3: The best motorcycle products and services
detaillefttop: We deliver the highest quality products to all motorcycle enthusiasts
detailrightTop1: Moto Shop, designed for motorcycle lovers and adventure seekers, offers high-quality, guaranteed products, equipment, professional repair services, and spare parts all in one place.
detailrightTop2: The brand operates with three core values in mind: nature, speed, and freedom. What started as a hobby has grown today into a professional team serving hundreds of customers.
dreamtext: Our ultimate goal is to organize eco-friendly, safe, and thrilling rides. But it’s not just about the ride — we aim to let every customer experience the excitement and value of the motorcycle world.
detail6: Don’t miss the most thrilling moments of Moto competitions!
detail7: Top racers, daring challenges, unlimited speed – all here!
location: Space Safety Circuit, behind 4 friendly animals, 2nd floor of Auto Undral Service, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
countTitle: Don’t miss the most thrilling moments of the Moto competition!
countdesc: Top racers, daring challenges, unlimited speed – all here!
our_detail: Elite Moto Shop offers motorcycle sales, repair services, accessories, online orders, and rental services.
attention_detail: You do not need to book an appointment for the following services: washing, replacing brake pads, changing brake fluid, starting the motorcycle, lubricating the chain, changing engine oil, and computer diagnostics.
loginerror: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
password_valid: Password must be at least 6 characters long
tour_des: The Elite MotoGP Round 2 will take place on September 6 at Power Land! High speed, precision skills, and the ultimate battles of motorsport await you!
